name: Vitale #5
description: Your 1.00 carat round-cornered rectangular modified brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VS1 clarity, very small inclusions, is combined with a rare white F colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. The cut of your diamond is commonly known as “radiant cut” and blends the elegance of an emerald cut with the brilliance of a round cut. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
